divs: Sighting DetailsThe attached photo's are from STS 75 Shuttle Tether Science Mission. Taking the film and breaking it down into single frames of film we were able to extract these phto's. Each photo has NASA's digital finger print from the Shuttle mission. I have many more photo's of the Craft and Alien's. If you have not seen the U-Tube STS 75 Tether video please view. please contact by e-mail for all information. We would be glad to digitally reconstruct how the pictures were produced from NASA's film footage.
